author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Sadly, HBO Max has made the decision to cancel one of their series after releasing only one season on their platform. The series finale was released not even a full week before the announcement was released. The network obviously didn’t want to keep fans hanging for more. This news may be disappointing for viewers who [...]

title: HBO Max Cancels Series After One Season

description:
The allegedly haunted doll known as “Annabelle,” that horror fans may recognize from The Conjuring and its follow-ups, was the focus of a “Devils on the Run Tour” when the paranormal investigator hosting the tour suddenly died. Dan Rivera, who was only 54-years-old, passed away unexpectedly during the tour. As reported by the NY Post, [...]

description:
